sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SCR_EXREG ( ID, ID_ARCH, ID_FDR, STATE, STATE_DATE, TYPE_ORIG, ID_OFIC, ID_EXCHANGE, ID_EXCHANGE_SIR, EXCHANGE_DATE, USERNAME, CODE_ENTITY, NAME_ENTITY, CODE_TRAMUNIT, NAME_TRAMUNIT, COMMENTS ) VALUES ( #id:INT#, #idLibro:INT#, #idRegistro:INT#, #idEstado:INT#, #fechaEstado:TIMESTAMP#, #tipoOrigen:INT#, #idOfic:INT#, #idIntercambioInterno:INT#, #idIntercambioRegistral:VARCHAR#, #fechaIntercambio:TIMESTAMP#, #username:VARCHAR#, #codeEntity:VARCHAR#, #nameEntity:VARCHAR#, #codeTramunit:VARCHAR#, #nameTramunit:VARCHAR#, #comentarios:VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO SCR_EXREGSTATE ( ID, ID_EXREG, STATE, STATE_DATE, USERNAME, COMMENTS ) VALUES ( #id:INT#, #idExReg:INT#, #idEstado:INT#, #fechaEstado:TIMESTAMP#, #userName:VARCHAR#, #comentarios:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SCR_EXREG SET STATE=#idEstado:INT#, STATE_DATE=#fechaEstado:TIMESTAMP#, COMMENTS=#comentarios:VARCHAR# WHERE ID=#id#

UPDATE SCR_EXREG SET STATE=#idEstado:INT#, STATE_DATE=#fechaEstado:TIMESTAMP#, ID_EXCHANGE=#idIntercambioInterno:INT#, ID_EXCHANGE_SIR=#idIntercambioRegistral#, COMMENTS=#comentarios:VARCHAR# WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SCR_EXREG where ID_ARCH=#idLibro:INT# and ID_FDR=#idRegistro:INT# and ID_OFIC=#idOficina:INT#
sqlMap.select: select * from SCR_EXREG where id_ofic=#idOficina:INT# AND STATE=#estado:INT#

select exreg.id, exreg.exchange_date,exreg.id_arch, exreg.id_fdr, exreg.id_ofic, exreg.type_orig, exreg.exchange_date, exreg.state, exreg.username, exreg.code_entity, exreg.name_entity, exreg.name_tramunit, exreg.code_tramunit, exreg.state_date, exreg.id_exchange, exreg.id_exchange_sir, exreg.comments, ofic.name as nameOfic from SCR_EXREG exreg, SCR_OFIC ofic where exreg.id_fdr=#idRegistro:INT# AND exreg.id_arch=#idLibro:INT# AND exreg.id_ofic = ofic.id

select exreg.id as id, exreg.exchange_date, exreg.id_arch as id_arch, exreg.id_fdr as id_fdr, exreg.type_orig as type_orig, exreg.id_exchange as id_exchange, exreg.id_exchange_sir as id_exchange_sir, exreg.code_entity as code_entity, exreg.name_entity as name_entity, exreg.code_tramunit as code_tramunit, exreg.name_tramunit as name_tramunit, exreg.state_date as state_date, exreg.state as state, exreg.id_ofic as id_ofic, exreg.comments as comments, libro.fld1 as fld1, libro.fld2 as fld2, libro.fld6 as fld6, libro.fld8 as fld8 from a$idLibro$sf libro, scr_exreg exreg where libro.fdrid=exreg.id_fdr and exreg.id_arch=#idLibro:INT# and exreg.id_ofic=#idOficina:INT# AND exreg.state=#estado:INT#
select *, 'NULL' as nameOfic from SCR_EXREG where id=#value#
select SCR_EXREG.*, 'NULL' as nameOfic from SCR_EXREG where STATE=#value#
select libro.fld1 as fld1, libro.fld2 as fld2, libro.fld6 as fld6 from a$idLibro$sf libro where libro.fdrid=#idRegistro:INT#
